definition: The word "rachsüchtig" refers to a particular characteristic or disposition of a person. It describes someone who harbors a strong desire for revenge or holds deep-seated feelings of vindictiveness. This term is commonly used to depict individuals who are driven by a strong urge to seek retribution or retaliate against perceived wrongdoings.

examples.german: Er ist rachsüchtig und plant Rache gegen seine Feinde.
examples.english: He is vengeful and plans revenge against his enemies.

examples.german: Sie ist eine rachsüchtige Person, die niemals vergibt.
examples.english: She is a vengeful person who never forgives.

examples.german: Seine rachsüchtige Natur führte zu vielen Konflikten.
examples.english: His vengeful nature led to many conflicts.

examples.german: Die rachsüchtige Tat des Mörders schockierte die Gemeinschaft.
examples.english: The vengeful act of the murderer shocked the community.

examples.german: Er handelte aus rachsüchtigen Motiven und nicht aus Vernunft.
examples.english: He acted out of vengeful motives and not out of reason.
